name: Mazahaedron's Worldheart Shard
effect: Gain 1 Æ. OR Gain 2 Æ that can only be used to gain a card. Place the next card you gain this turn on top of any ally's discard pile.

name: Phaedraxa's Tourmaline Shard
effect:
Gain 1 Æ.
Any ally may suffer 1 damage. If they do, they destroy a card in hand.

name: Fractured Shell
effect: At the start of the game, set this next to asupply pile that costs 4 Æ or more. When a player gains a card from that supply, that player gains a charge.

name: Extra-Dimensional Lens
effect: Once per turn during your main phase, you may reveal the top three cards of the nemesis deck. Return them in any order.

name: Seer's Bracer
effect: Once per turn during your main phase when you gain a charge, any ally draws a card.
